biotools.summary:
Integrated Genomics and Therapeutics Predictors of Small Cell Lung Cancer Cell Lines based on their genomic signatures.

CellMiner Cross Database (CellMinerCDB) is the first web application to allow translational researchers to conduct analyses across all major cancer cell line pharmacogenomic data sources from NCI-DTP NCI-60, Sanger GDSC, and Broad CCLE/CTRP.

bioschemas.name: SCLCCellMiner
